Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Deep vase with a flat ring base and a slightly flattened convex lip. The buff-coloured clay bears throwing marks, has an organic temper and is covered with a red slip both inside and outside. The modelling is correct but is of an asymmetrical shape.
